data.eml:eml: A new species of Anacanthoroides and redescription of Apedunculata discoidea (Monogenoidea) parasitizing Prochilodus argenteus (Actinopterygii) from the São Francisco River, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monteiro, Cassandra Moraes, Brasil-Sato, Marilia Carvalho (2014): A new species of Anacanthoroides and redescription of Apedunculata discoidea (Monogenoidea) parasitizing Prochilodus argenteus (Actinopterygii) from the São Francisco River, Brazil. Zootaxa 3784 (3): 259-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.3.5
